title: Taiwan 'very moved' by Japanese prime minister's support, premier says
description: TAIPEI: Taiwan has been "very moved" by Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi's comments last month on peace and stability even in the face of strong pressure, Premier Cho Jung-tai said on Friday (Dec 5). China and Japan are in their worst diplomatic crisis …
